mapper.select: /* ResponseDAO.showSurvey */ SELECT SRV_MSTR_ID, TMP_MSTR_ID, SRV_MST_NM, SRV_MST_TG, SRV_MST_DC, COLUMN_GET(SRV_MST_ITEMS,'srvMstItems' as char) as SRV_MST_ITEMS, PBSH_DT, EXPR_DT, INST_USRID, UPDT_USRID FROM TN_SRV_MSTR WHERE 1=1 AND SRV_MSTR_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: /* ResponseDAO.insert */ INSERT INTO TN_SRV_RESPNS ( SRV_MSTR_ID, SRV_RESPNS_JSON, INST_DT, UPDT_DT, INST_USRID) VALUES ( #{srvMstrId}, COLUMN_CREATE('srvRespnsJson',#{srvRespnsJson}), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{instUsrid} )
